<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pet/findByTags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.
